overview:
Thorsten Trapp founded tyntec in 2002 together with Dr. Ralph Eric Kunz and developed the company’s mobile messaging platform architecture. As CTO He is also responsible for tyntec’s technical innovations and intellectual property.

A communications and software expert, Mr. Trapp founded his own IT services company in 1995. He then expanded his experience in the development and hosting of scalable internet server platforms to the conception and implementation of infrastructure for mobile data transport.

Thorsten studied computer science and biology at the Technical University of Dortmund.
